name: 2003 :: 490 Transmutations (23rd Altar)
description:
mpeg4
490x360
00:05:53

The Columbia disaster was NASA's 113th shuttle mission. Challenger exploded 1m 13s after takeoff. M113 is a shape shifting alien on Star Trek.

I was on the set of ‘Kazam’ when it happened. It was as if a cloak was lifted from my eyes to reveal the sum of human experience, connected by crystalline threads of light, transposed onto a primordial landscape. I could feel the interconnectedness of all matter, historical events, and psychic experience in my soul as my individuation began.

- Shaquille O’Neal 1996

When your world looks kinda weird
And you wish that you weren’t there
Just close your eyes and make believe
And you can be anywhere

- ‘Muppet Babies’ theme, 1984
